CustomField.description: Status equal Schedule, Confirm, Mobile Review, Received By Billing and Ready to Bill
CustomField.formula:
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirmed')
||
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Scheduled')
||
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Mobile Review') ||
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Received By Billing') ||
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Ready to Bill')
CustomField.label: SC
